Message.Title: Free OJ
Message.Msg: I understand that Holder is looking into if he can file a civil rights charge because the Las Vegas jury and prosecutor were racist, thus clearing the path for a new trial for the double murderer. This injustice can not stand!

Message.Title: GOP policing uteri
Message.Msg: Tue Jul 16, 2013, 09:29 AM USA/ET - Edit history (1) The party of fiscal responsibility is hard at work policing uteri in North Dakota: North Dakota already has spent more than $52,000 defending the 2011 state law, according to records obtained by The Associated Press. Records show that Dr. Donna Harrison, the president the American Association of Pro-Life Obstetricians and Gynecologists, has billed the state more than $49,000 to act as an expert witness. In his ruling Monday, Corwin was highly critical of Harrison, saying her “opinions lack scientific support , tend to be based on unsubstantiated concerns and are generally at odds with solid medical evidence.” The AAPLOG is all for trans-vaginal ultrasound, against insurance paying for contraception, and against Plan B. They think abortions cause breast cancer, cerebral palsy and a host of other ills, and they think the jury is out on whether having an IUD or taking the pill is committing abortion. I’d suggest checking their find a physician page to make sure your or your family member’s OB/GYN isn’t a cult member. More from the ND article: N.D. judge: 2011 abortion law unconstitutional A 2011 North Dakota law that outlaws one of two drugs used in nonsurgical abortions violates the state and U.S. constitutions, a state judge ruled Monday. After a three-day trial in April, East Central Judge Wickham Corwin said he'd rule in favor of the state's sole abortion clinic, calling the 2011 state law "simply wrongheaded." Corwin officially ruled on the case Monday. One abortion clinic for the whole state, and the state government is using public money (to pay unethical doctors to lie) to try to shut it down.

And what is the response from the White African at 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue...another round of golf. Four Children Gunned Down in Chicago During Zimmerman Trial In the 20-day period of the George Zimmerman trial, four minors, three teens and a five-year-old boy were gunned down in Chicago.

Message.Title: Another bogus GOP scandal
Message.Msg: "There is no evidence President Obama used the Internal Revenue Service to target his political enemies, according to Sen. Roy Blunt (R-Mo.), a member of the GOP's Senate leadership team. "Presidents have always been very careful about maintaining the appearance of keeping hands off the IRS," Blunt told The New York Times."

Topic.Title: Where is the outradge

Message.Msg: **which goes to show you that if you are white and worried about getting murdered you should profile white** Typical liberal response, pointing to other bad behavior to justify this behavior. I think we can agree that it is safer in white districts, right? Lets check the facts, shall we... 1.The incarceration rate in state or federal prison or jail for men was 1,384 per 100,000 residents, for women 134 per 100,000 residents. The rate for white men was 736 per 100,000, for black men 4,789 per 100,000, for Hispanic men 1,862 per 100,000. The rate for white women was 94 per 100,000, for black women 358 per 100,000, and for Hispanic women 152 per 100,000. 2.Of the 249,400 state prison inmates serving time for offenses at yearend 2004, 112,500 (45.1%) were black, 51,800 (20.8%) were Hispanic, and 65,900 (26.4%) were white.

Topic.Title: Trayvon Martin made mistakes too, mistakes that ultimately cost him his life!

Message.Msg: Trayvon over reacted to being questioned and Zimmerman overreacted by shooting someone over punches. I seriously doubt Zimmerman would be dead if he was not carrying his gun. If trained properly, he could have at least shot him in the leg. I think that would have deterred anymore advances.

Topic.Title: Trayvon Martin made mistakes too, mistakes that ultimately cost him his life!

Message.Msg: "Trayvon over reacted to being questioned" I agree and the over reaction was to punch some one asking the questions, I belive this response started at the home with his parents. As to doubting Zimmerman would be dead if not carrying his gun, I don't get to that without going back to being hit in the face and having the attacker on top of me. Shoot the attacker in the leg, I only see that if the attacker was not on top of me, but he was. Conculsion for myself is Tryvon had some real hate in his heart to attack over being question, and this started at home with the parents.

Topic.Title: Trayvon Martin made mistakes too, mistakes that ultimately cost him his life!

Message.Msg: being a child, one can't fault trayvon for realized he was being stalked by a person who would not any question had he not been carrying a concealed weapon. Too bad trayvon wasn't packing 9mm, then could have safely told Zimmerman to fk off. Zimmerman had no right at all to ask any question of travon, period. neighborhood watches are not supposed to do ANYTHING but call the police, and they are NOT supposed to carry weapons.
